Insurance & Premium
Self-Pay Options for
Physical Therapy

Whether you're using insurance or paying out-of-pocket, I provide personalized care with advanced technology to help you move and feel better. My one-person practice offers both insurance-covered treatment and premium self-pay options to meet your specific needs.

Insurance Plans Accepted

✔️

Major Plans Accepted

I currently accept most commercial insurance plans such as:
Aetna, UnitedHealthcare (UHC), and Blue Cross Blue Shield (BCBS).

If you have a Medicaid or Medicare managed plan like HealthFirst, WellCare, or VillageCare, please check your insurance coverage here. I'll personally review and let you know if I can accept your plan.

❓

Check Your Coverage

Not sure if your insurance is accepted? Use the link below to fill out a short form. I'll verify your coverage and email you within 3 business day.

👉 Check Your Insurance Coverage
💡

Understanding Your Costs

Some plans have deductibles, copays, or out-of-pocket limits. I'll explain what to expect so there are no surprises.

Self-Pay Options & First Visit Information

Service Price What It's For
Radical Shockwave + Laser $60 🔹 For general muscle tension, tight fascia, or post-exercise soreness.
🔹 Ideal for office workers or postural stress.
Focused Shockwave $140 🔹 For deep chronic knots, scar tissue, or stubborn trigger points.
🔹 Targets deeper layers than radical shockwave.
PT Evaluation $150 🔍 Includes full-body screening + AI movement scan + personalized treatment roadmap.
Follow-Up PT (60 min) $120 👐 Manual therapy, mobility training, and recovery tech support. Best after evaluation.
AI Movement Assessment (No PT) $100 🤖 Standalone 10-movement AI scan + auto-generated corrective exercises.
🔹 Great for DIY recovery plans or fitness baseline.

💬 Feeling stuck with just the basics?

Many insurance plans only cover standard therapy—but what if your body needs more?

🎯 As a new insurance patient, you’re invited to try our advanced upgrades at a first-time rate:

  • ✅ Radical Shockwave + Class 4 Laser — only $30
    For tired muscles, stubborn tension, or stress buildup.
  • ✅ Focused Shockwave — only $60
    For deeper issues like chronic knots, plantar fasciitis, or postural pain.

🧾 Bring your insurance card, photo ID, and referral (if required).
💡 Text or email is the fastest way to reach me—I’m a one-person clinic, so I appreciate your patience!

🧠 Want to know if it’s worth it? Just ask during your session—I’ll assess your case and let you know if an upgrade can truly help.

Not Sure If You're Covered?

Not sure if your insurance is accepted? Just fill out this short form—I'll look into it for you and usually get back via email within 3 business day. No pressure, no commitments—just support and clarity.
